data.label: 极光认证 SDK
data.description: 极光认证整合了三大运营商的网关认证能力，为开发者提供了一键登录和号码认证功能，优化用户注册/登录、号码验证的体验，提高安全性。

data.label: Aurora Authentication SDK
data.description: Aurora Authentication integrates the gateway authentication capabilities of the three major operators, providing developers with one-click login and number authentication functions, optimizing user registration/login and number verification experience, and enhancing security.
